newsitem.title: USA: Pentagon to consider Lockheed-Grumman merger.
newsitem.headline: Pentagon to consider Lockheed-Grumman merger.

text.p: The Defense Department will need several months to examine the terms of a merger proposed by aeropace giants Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman Corp, a department spokesman said on Thursday.

"It'll be several months at least, this can take quite a while ... This is gritty hard economic analysis and it's not something that can be done easily or quickly," Pentagon spokesman Kenneth Bacon told reporters.
Bacon said the Pentagon's specialist in industrial affairs, John Goodman, would lead the team considering the merger and then give its recommendation to antitrust authorities.
